item.title: The Framework Laptop 16 Can Now Be Upgraded to an RTX 5070
item.description: The Nvidia RTX 5070 is coming to the Framework Laptop 16, proving that upgradable GPUs in laptops aren’t just a fool’s errand.

item.title: Parents sue OpenAI over ChatGPT’s role in son’s suicide
item.description: Before sixteen-year-old Adam Raine died by suicide, he had spent months telling ChatGPT about his plans to end his life.
